title: What UBS says on Tech Mahindra; CLSA on SBI and Eicher Motors - Economic Times
content: What UBS says on Tech Mahindra; CLSA on SBI and Eicher Motors  Economic Times
description: On Eicher Motors, CLSA has a target of Rs 3,089. Eicher Motors is its top pick in the two-wheeler segment, as domestic demand for Royal Enfield is strong with improving production numbers. Pricing is strong and demand is returning, it said, adding that operating leverage will drive a margin recovery in the VECV business.
